languages.text:
All allies who receive an extra turn while in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm's area have their next non-attack ability cost reduced by -1 AP and can also use one consumable without spending AP at all. Those bonuses are separate.
Only one copy of this effect can trigger at a time.

traits.locale_text:
All allies who receive an extra turn while in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm's area have their next non-attack ability cost reduced by -1 AP and can also use one consumable without spending AP at all. Those bonuses are separate.
Only one copy of this effect can trigger at a time.

languages.text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado situado en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, el coste de su próxima capacidad que no sea de ataque se reduce en −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y podrá usar un objeto consumible gastando 0 PA. Si hay varios enjambres de servocráneos presentes en el combate, este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado situado en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, el coste de su próxima capacidad que no sea de ataque se reduce en −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y podrá usar un objeto consumible gastando 0 PA. Si hay varios enjambres de servocráneos presentes en el combate, este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 每当伺服头骨集群距离4格以内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，该盟友的下个非攻击类能力消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点，且可以在不消耗行动点数的情况下使用1件消耗品。如果战场上存在多个伺服头骨集群，此效果无法叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当伺服头骨集群距离4格以内的盟友获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，该盟友的下个非攻击类能力消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点，且可以在不消耗行动点数的情况下使用1件消耗品。如果战场上存在多个伺服头骨集群，此效果无法叠加。

languages.text: Lorsqu'un allié se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, le coût de sa capacité non offensive est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et il peut utiliser un objet consommable sans dépenser de PA. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable si plusieurs essaims de servocrânes participent au combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un allié se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, le coût de sa capacité non offensive est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et il peut utiliser un objet consommable sans dépenser de PA. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable si plusieurs essaims de servocrânes participent au combat.

languages.text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir dost birim, bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandığında bir sonraki saldırı dışı kabiliyetinin bedeli de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} azalır ve 0 EP bedelle bir sarf eşya kullanabilir. Çatışmada birden fazla hizmelet sürüsü varsa etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir dost birim, bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandığında bir sonraki saldırı dışı kabiliyetinin bedeli de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} azalır ve 0 EP bedelle bir sarf eşya kullanabilir. Çatışmada birden fazla hizmelet sürüsü varsa etki üst üste birikmez.

languages.text: Когда союзник, находящийся в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, для него стоимость следующей неатакующей способности снижается на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, а также он может применить один расходный предмет без затрат ОД. Если в бою участвует несколько роев сервочерепов, эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник, находящийся в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, для него стоимость следующей неатакующей способности снижается на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, а также он может применить один расходный предмет без затрат ОД. Если в бою участвует несколько роев сервочерепов, эффект не суммируется.

Когда союзник, находящийся в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, для него стоимость следующей неатакующей способности снижается на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, а также он может применить один расходный предмет без затрат ОД. Если в бою участвует несколько роев сервочерепов, эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: サーボスカルスウォームの周囲4セル以内の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターンを得るたび{/g} 、その味方は次の攻撃以外の能力コストを-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} 減少させ、消費APを0にして消耗品を1つ使用できる。複数のサーボスカルスウォームが戦闘を おこなっている場合、この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text: サーボスカルスウォームの周囲4セル以内の味方が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターンを得るたび{/g} 、その味方は次の攻撃以外の能力コストを-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} 減少させ、消費APを0にして消耗品を1つ使用できる。複数のサーボスカルスウォームが戦闘を おこなっている場合、この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: Erhält ein Verbündeter in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}, werden seine nächsten nicht-offensiven Fähigkeitskosten um −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} reduziert und er kann einen Verbrauchsgegenstand für 0 AP einsetzen. Sind mehrere Servoschädel-Schwärme im Kampf, wird der Effekt nicht gestapelt.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally within a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, they have their next non-attacking ability cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can use one consumable, spending 0 AP. If multiple servo-skull swarms are in combat, the effect does not stack.

Sind mehrere Servoschädel-Schwärme im Kampf, wird der Effekt nicht gestapelt.
